c74object.name: av.movie~
c74object.digest: Movie playback made easier and seemless with audio output
c74object.description: A wrapper around the jit.movie~ object for easy patching with movie files. Uses the viddll engine and loads begin and end of the movie in the RAM for seamless looping of the file. Defaults with a texture output instead of a matrix. Outputs stereo sound left and right signals.

method.name: int
method.digest: Start/stop movie playback with 1/0 or toggle
